text: Alex Borimirov (; born 13 May 1998) is a German-born Bulgarian footballer who plays as a left winger.Profile at TheFinalBall, thefinalball.com He is the son of former football player Daniel Borimirov who has played for Levski Sofia and TSV 1860 Munich. ==Career== Alex Borimirov has started playing football at the young age of 8 years at the youth academy of football club PFC Levski Sofia. Borimirov made his first team debut in a 4–0 First league with a home win over Vereya on 28 August 2016, coming on as a substitute for Añete. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !Colspan="3"|Club performance!!Colspan="2"|League!!Colspan="2"|Cup!!Colspan="2"|Continental!!Colspan="2"|Other!!Colspan="3"|Total |- !Club!!League!!Season!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- !Colspan="3"|Bulgaria!!Colspan="2"|League!!Colspan="2"|Bulgarian Cup!!Colspan="2"|Europe!!Colspan="2"|OtherIncludes Bulgarian Supercup matches.!!Colspan="2"|Total |- |rowspan="2" valign="center"|Levski Sofia | rowspan="2"|First League |2016–17 |5||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||5||0 |- |2017–18 |1||0||1||0||3||0||colspan="2"|–||5||0 |- |rowspan="1" valign="center"|Lokomotiv Sofia (loan) | rowspan="1"|Second League |2017–18 !0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||0||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career statistics !! 6 !! 0 !! 1 !! 0 !! 3 !! 0 !! 0 !! 0 !! 10 !! 0 |} ==References== ==External links== * * Profile in LevskiSofia.info Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian footballers Category:Bulgaria youth international footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:PFC Levski Sofia players Category:FC Lokomotiv 1929 Sofia players Category:PFC Slavia Sofia players
